description: Try our easy to follow Prawn With Mint, Chile, And Ginger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn With Mint, Chile, And Ginger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs fresh ginger, peeled and finely grated
3 fresh hot red chiles, seeded and minced

recipeInstructions.text: To make the marinade, whisk the oil, mint, lime juice, ginger, chiles, and garlic. Season with salt. Add the prawn and mix. Refrigerate for at least 15 minutes and up to 1 hour.
To serve, divide the endive among 4 salad plates. Top with the prawn and garnish with the watercress and lime wedges. Serve immediately.
